content_block_programmatic.name: Enter Account client name
content_block_programmatic.programmatic_content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">


<style>

</style>

<script>

var my_dashboardMessageHandler = new DashboardMessageHandler("FilterEmployeeId");

function publishFilter (searchTerm) {
var filter_message = {};
filter_message.id = "FilterEmployeeId";
filter_message.table = "x_ebh_bill_report_competitors_aoa";

if (searchTerm == ""){
clearFilter();
}
else {
filter_message.filter = "bill_report_sys_id.account_client_nameSTARTSWITH"+ searchTerm;
	
}
SNC.canvas.interactiveFilters.setDefaultValue({
id: filter_message.id,
filters: [filter_message]
}, false);
my_dashboardMessageHandler.publishFilter(filter_message.table, filter_message.filter);
}

function clearFilter() {
var filter_message = {};
filter_message.id = "FilterEmployeeId";
filter_message.table = "x_ebh_bill_report_competitors_aoa";
filter_message.filter = "";
SNC.canvas.interactiveFilters.setDefaultValue({
id: filter_message.id,
filters: [filter_message]
}, false);
my_dashboardMessageHandler.removeFilter();
}
</script>

<input id="searchTerm" type="text" class="form-control" value="" onchange="publishFilter(this.value);"></input>

</j:jelly>
